strings.AboutView/aboutText: Filtermusic is updated with radio stations that stream in high quality (128Kbps and higher) and play only music; you won't find a radio here where people having lenghty discussions. All streams presented have been filtered especially for electronic & dance music from thousands of stations all over the Internet.

strings.DeactivatedView/deactivatedText: This version of filtermusic is no longer supported. Please check your store or our website for a newer version.
